title: Frontend Developer
description: As a Frontend Developer, I specialize in building dynamic and visually appealing user interfaces using React, TypeScript,JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I strive to create high-performance,responsive websites with reusable components that enhance the user experience, ensuring seamless interactions across all devices.

title: Backend Developer
description: With experience in backend development, I focus on building robust and scalable server-side applications using Node.js and various modern technologies. I prioritize performance, security, and maintainability to deliver solutions that support seamlessintegrations and optimized workflows.

title: UI Designer
description: As a UI Designer, I craft intuitive, user-centered designs that bring digital experiences to life. My expertise lies in creating visually stunning, responsive layouts that adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes. I aim to design beautiful, functional interfaces that ensure a smooth user journey across all platforms.
